items.title: IN MEMORY: 'Old Guard' Places 280,000+ Flags at Arlington Cemetery
items.description: This weekend millions of Americans pause on Memorial Day to honor the nation's heroes and reflect on the sacrifices of its fallen soldiers. In that vein, soldiers from the 3rd Infantry Regiment placed flags this week at more than 280,000 graves of fallen service members.

items.title: Six Babies! Couple Welcomes Sextuplets After 17-Year Struggle with Infertility
items.description: Adeboye and Ajibola Taiwo of Richmond, Virginia, recently became parents to sextuplets. The Nigerian couple tried for 17 years to have children. In November they were overjoyed when doctors told them they detected four heartbeats on their first ultrasound. But in January, they learned they were expecting two more babies, for a total of six.
items.summary: Adeboye and Ajibola Taiwo of Richmond, Virginia, recently became parents to sextuplets. The Nigerian couple tried for 17 years to have children. items.title: The Miraculous Story of Survival for Little Girl Who Was Injured in a Drive-by Shooting
items.description: An Atlanta mother says it is a miracle her 6-year-old daughter survived after being shot in the neck.Princess Jackson is recovering at Grady Memorial Hospital. She was sitting on her bed watching television Sunday morning when she was hit with stray bullet from a drive-by shooting.

items.title: 'I'm Scared to Die': 6-Year-Old's Plea to Stop the Killing Changes Gang Members' Hearts
items.description: Jeffrey Laney, a kindergartner from St. Louis, has a strong message for adults, "Stop killing each other." The boy made the emotional plea after his mother's 16-year-old-cousin, Taylor Simpson, was killed in a drive-by shooting last month.
